column2: Redass, 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: medication works well for bits of waste held in anus folds long enough to deteriorate and cause very painful irritation.  Delivery tip only 1" long screws onto tube, requires holding tube and trying to insert into rectum, then trying to squeeze tube until feel cold cream in rectum.  By then I've used 1/4 tube per use, so 4 applications per tube, very messy to clean up.  Prohibitively expensive cost per application, awkward trying to squeeze cream out of tube while 1" tip inserted in rectum.  Delivery system designed by someone with an Edgar Allen Poe sense of humor. Macabre!!!!

column2: Jan, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I went to the doctor for what I believed was my first ever hemorrhoid. It was confirmed and I was given this prescription. I used it for 4 days with no change to the one hemorrhoid. I then woke up on the 5th day to 2 more hemorrhoids! These aren't as big but they itch tremendously! This medicine is not helping at all with the reduction of the hemorrhoids or the itch. I have a call into the doctor to see if there is another medicine that will help to get rid of them!

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have reaccuring external hemeroids that started with my pregnancy 5 years ago.  They come back every now and then.  This last time have been very bad and am having a hard time getting them to go away.  I am taking Proctofoam AND this cream as well for external.  I have been using it for 6 days now.  Sometimes it will work, and keep itching and irritation down, but other times it does not.  I do not think it is strong enough...2.5%  I think what is really helping is taking 800 mg of Motrin (normal dosage amount for me...perhaps you should start with 200 mg...on tablet...then work your way up if needed).  The Motrine had done wonder in reducing the swelling.This cream tho, I think would be fine for minor discomfort but not the major ones.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: After less than a week and using only 2 x a day this medication took the painful hemorrhoids packing! I was contemplating surgery anything to get some relief and WOW!  My dr was right!!!  This is magical cream!!!
